panels.title: PC - Ent Lib Get Subs latencies
Subs - Overall response throughput by codes

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) /
sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service.*"}/container_spec_cpu_period{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", pod=~"$service.*"}) by (pod)
